step_feedback.feedback: You extended your arm overhead well and opened your hand completely.  Good job maintaining the position throughout the repetitions.
Try to keep your arm straighter overhead; there was some bending observed. Focus on fully extending your arm before making a fist.
While the hand opening was good, ensure your arm remains fully extended overhead throughout the exercise.  Try to maintain a consistent arm position.
The fist-making and hand-opening were inconsistent.  Focus on coordinating your breathing with the movements, inhaling as you make a fist and exhaling as you open your hand.

exercise_summary: You did a good job with the overhead pumping exercise. Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and coordinate your breathing with the hand movements.  Focus on fully extending your arm before each fist clench. Let's work on improving consistency in steps 2, 3, and 4.
